Web Developer,

UI/UX Designer &

Graphic Designer

Hungry Catering

Hungry provides top chef-prepared office catering for hundreds of companies all around the Washington, DC area. I currently work as the front-end web developer at Hungry and built their responsive user interface with React.js, HTML5 and CSS3/SASS

3Advance

3Advance develops consumer-facing web and mobile apps, and enterprise-level database management applications. The client provided me with Photoshop files of their new website design which I coded using HTML, CSS3 and JavaScript. The site is mobile friendly wand was tested in multiple browsers
